headline: FICO Announces New Stock Repurchase Program on February 25, 2026
summary: BOZEMAN, Mont., February 25, 2026--Global analytics leader, FICO (NYSE:FICO), today announced that its Board of Directors has approved a stock repurchase program to acquire up to $1.5 billion of the company’s outstanding common stock. This new program was approved following completion of FICO’s previous stock repurchase program, which was in effect from June 2025 until adoption of the new program in February 2026. headline: FICO Mortgage Tools And MeridianLink Deal Support Undervalued Growth Story
summary: FICO (NYSE:FICO) has launched a new consumer-facing Mortgage Score Simulator that helps users assess and adjust their mortgage readiness. The company has partnered with MeridianLink to integrate its Mortgage Direct License Program into MeridianLink's platform for broader delivery of FICO mortgage scores. Major mortgage industry resellers are adopting the integrated solution, expanding access to FICO Scores across the market. For investors watching NYSE:FICO, this move sits squarely in the...

headline: Assessing Fair Isaac’s Valuation After A Sharp Multi‑Month Share Price Pullback
summary: What Fair Isaac’s recent share slide means for investors Fair Isaac (FICO) has seen a sharp pullback, with the stock down about 20% over the past month and roughly 32% over the past 3 months. This has prompted investors to reassess the risk reward trade off. See our latest analysis for Fair Isaac. The recent slide fits into a wider cooling trend, with a 1 day share price return of a 4.21% decline and a year to date share price return of a 25.29% decline, while the 3 year total shareholder...

headline: Top S&P500 movers in Wednesday's session
summary: Let's delve into the developments on the US markets in the middle of the day on Wednesday. Below, you'll find the top gainers and losers within the S&P500 index during today's session.
